title: Is anyone else getting low placement? (cough cough b5)
body:
So before the flex queue update I won 6/10 placements games and was put into Bronze 5. Yeah I was depressed... did not understand why until the update for the flex queue came. And than when i finished my flex game, (we won) I was placed into Bronze 5 again... WTF!?

Any thoughts to why I was put into Bronze 5? Because i'm bad? My MMR is bronze 5? The flex queue update didn't help? HELP ME!! And did anyone else experienced the same thing I did? ;-;

replies.body: As BarryButcher said. You will almost always get ranked lower than your end of season rank after placements, so from low B4, a B5 placement is very likely.

your rank from the season has a huge impact where you place.

If you are bronze 3-4-5 you most likely will get B5 after placements
It can be mate but think of it this way. If you made there before why can't you do that again?
